DOC.criteria: Have new diagnosis metastatic renal cell carcinoma ; Measurable disease Must least 18 year old ; Have schedule unilateral nephrectomy excisional biopsy/metastasectomy ECOG 0 1 ; Free brain metastasis CT MRI ; Normal renal function contralateral kidney ; Male nonpregnant/nonlactating female appropriate birth control method study ; Clinically acceptable screening result .
